content: I do think having two co-leads was working really well for the rustdoc team: perhaps we should select a new one given that jyn stepped down? @GuillaumeGomez thoughts (and have any candidates in mind?)
I don't. If someone wants to step up?
I'll explicitly say I don't want to be a co-lead. One of the joys for me of contributing rustdoc as a spare-time project is not having to lead and make lots of decisions. :-)
@jsha well, lots of folks lead in their spare time, but that's fine
and i'm happy to help the new lead find their way around

i think most of what joshua did that was valuable was keeping an eye on how to grow the team; and trying to ensure the team was healthy with good plans and building something we could sustainably maintain
